00041 namespace Hyperspace {
00042 
00043   class Session;

00048   class ClientKeepaliveHandler : public DispatchHandler {
00049 
00050   public:
00051     ClientKeepaliveHandler(Comm *, PropertiesPtr &, Session *);
00052 
00053     virtual void handle(Hypertable::EventPtr &event_ptr);
00054 
00055     void register_handle(ClientHandleStatePtr &handle_state) {
00056       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00057       HandleMap::iterator iter = m_handle_map.find(handle_state->handle);
00058       assert(iter == m_handle_map.end());
00059       m_handle_map[handle_state->handle] = handle_state;
00060     }
00061 
00062     void unregister_handle(uint64_t handle) {
00063       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00064       m_handle_map.erase(handle);
00065     }
00066 
00067     bool get_handle_state(uint64_t handle, ClientHandleStatePtr &handle_state) {
00068       ScopedLock lock(m_mutex);
00069       HandleMap::iterator iter = m_handle_map.find(handle);
00070       if (iter == m_handle_map.end())
00071         return false;
00072       handle_state = (*iter).second;
00073       return true;
00074     }
00075 
00076     uint64_t get_session_id() {return m_session_id;}
00077     void expire_session();
00078 
00079     void destroy_session();
00080 
00081   private:
00082     Mutex              m_mutex;
00083     boost::xtime       m_last_keep_alive_send_time;
00084     boost::xtime       m_jeopardy_time;
00085     bool m_dead;
00086     Comm *m_comm;
00087     uint32_t m_lease_interval;
00088     uint32_t m_keep_alive_interval;
00089     struct sockaddr_in m_master_addr;
00090     struct sockaddr_in m_local_addr;
00091     bool m_verbose;
00092     Session *m_session;
00093     uint64_t m_session_id;
00094     ClientConnectionHandlerPtr m_conn_handler_ptr;
00095     uint64_t m_last_known_event;
00096     typedef hash_map<uint64_t, ClientHandleStatePtr> HandleMap;
00097     HandleMap  m_handle_map;
00098     typedef hash_map<uint64_t, boost::xtime> BadNotificationHandleMap;
00099     BadNotificationHandleMap m_bad_handle_map;
00100     static const uint64_t ms_bad_notification_grace_period = 120000;
00101   };
